title: Creepy Angelina Jolie ‘lookalike’ reveals her real face
text:
Do you remember the Angelina Jolie lookalike who supposedly got plastic surgery to resemble the star?

Well, this is how she really looks and it’s not as shocking as she made out.

Sahar Tabar, 20, was actually pulling everyone’s leg when she she claimed to have got many surgeries to resemble the movie star.

This is how Sahar Tabar really looks (Picture: Sahar Tabar/Instagram)

Sahar Tabar, 20, aka zombie Angelina Jolie (Picture: Sahar Tabar/Instagram)

The Iranian had been mocked for looking like a ‘zombie’ instead of her idol.

The pictures of her were actually just really good Photoshop jobs from the Instagrammer, who managed to fool a lot of people online.

But a new photo showed her dressed down and looking more traditional, a world away from the images that surfaced last year.

Its not as dramatic as her previous Photoshopped look (Picture: Sahar Tabar/Instagram)

This is frightening (Picture: Sahar Tabar/Instagram)

This doesn’t quite look like Angelina Jolie (Picture: Sahar Tabar/Instagram)

Angelina Jolie attends the British Academy Film Awards (BAFTA) on February 18, 2018 (Picture: Getty Images)

She told Russian broadcaster Sputnik at the time: ‘I did not even think about being like Jolie. Also, I did not want to resemble the cartoon character the Corpse Bride.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Now I understand that I have something to do with them, but I am a muse myself and remembering someone is not an end in itself.’

Ms Tabar did previously admit she had some work done on her face, including getting lip fillers and having nose surgery.

But this of course did not make her look like zombie Angelina Jolie, which was a relief to everyone.

Got a story for Metro.co.uk? If you have a story for our news team, email us at webnews@metro.co.uk. You can also follow us on Facebook and Twitter.
